summary.span: 通过测试程序集的强名称确定该程序集是否属于代码组。

span.span: Determines whether an assembly belongs to a code group by testing its strong name.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 强名称非常适合指定代码程序集，您可以为这些程序集指定丰富的强大权限集。Strong names are well suited to specifying code assemblies to which you give a rich set of powerful permissions. 由于强名称经过密码验证，攻击者无法模拟合法程序集并使用其权限。Since strong names are cryptographically verified, attackers cannot impersonate rightful assemblies and use their permissions.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 强名称非常适合指定代码程序集，您可以为这些程序集指定丰富的强大权限集。Strong names are well suited to specifying code assemblies to which you give a rich set of powerful permissions. 由于强名称经过密码验证，攻击者无法模拟合法程序集并使用其权限。Since strong names are cryptographically verified, attackers cannot impersonate rightful assemblies and use their permissions. `name` 和 `version` 参数是可选参数。The `name` and `version` parameters are optional. 例如，你可以创建一个 ，它 通过传入参数检查并 (但不能 ) `null` `version` 。For example, you can create a that checks for and (but not ) by passing `null` into the `version` parameter. 如果 `name` 是空字符串 ( "" ) ， 则会引发。If `name` is an empty string (""), an is thrown.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Blob 是唯一指定软件发行者公钥的加密信息。A blob is cryptographic information that uniquely specifies the public key of the software publisher. Blob 与证书的不同之处在于，blob 只包含有关公钥的信息;证书还包括将持有者名称与密钥关联的信息，以及用于验证证书的信息。Blobs differ from certificates in that the blob only has information about the public key; the certificate also includes information that associates a name of the holder with the key, as well as information to verify the certificate.
